btrplace.model

Class DefaultMapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • btrplace.model.DefaultMapping
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Mapping, Cloneable

    public class DefaultMapping
extends Object
implements Mapping, Cloneable
    Default implementation of Mapping.

    Methods getRunningVMs(), getSleepingVMs(), getAllVMs(), getAllNodes(), getRunningVMs(Collection), getSleepingVMs(java.util.Collection) have a O(n) complexity.

    Methods is*() have a O(1) complexity.

    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier

      Make a new mapping from an existing one.

      • addRunningVM

        public boolean addRunningVM(VM vm,
                            Node n)
        Description copied from interface: Mapping
        Set a VM running on a node. The node must already be online. If the VM is already in a other location or state in the mapping, its state is updated
        Specified by:
        addRunningVM in interface Mapping
        Parameters:
        vm - the VM
        n - the node that will host the VM. The node must already be considered as online.
        Returns:
        true iff the VM is assigned on the node.
